version_description: Several tweaks and bugfixes.

- Wormholes can now be unlocked earlier on and their income multipliers have been increased overall.
- Additional appearances for the Rocket have been added.
- Effects on income from different sources have been included in the structure overview.
- Audio can now be muted at the very beginning of the game.
- Several tweaks and bugfixes.

- Setup for our first event "The Christmas Star", which starts next week!
- Added 6 new event related characters. Get them during the event
- Graphical tweaks for the winter version of the game
- Several tweaks and bugfixes
- Several tweaks and bugfixes

- Added landing animations to Rocket missions
- Crew selection interface now shows how stats would change compared to currently assigned Crew member
- Several tweaks and bugfixes

- Added new graphics for the moon base
- Several tweaks and bugfixes

- New Space Station interior visuals on higher upgrades
- Updated the privacy policy
- Several minor bug fixes and improvements

- Content and new Staff for upcoming event "Solar Colonies" has been added
- Each Staff member now belongs to a unique team - collecting teams grants attribute bonuses
- Added moving vehicles to the Space Center to make it appear more vivid
- Several minor bug fixes and performance improvements
- Several tweaks and bugfixes

- Send your Staff on contract missions to receive unique rewards and improve their ranks
- Every Staff member can now carry a piece of Equipment which can significantly increase their stats
- Gather Antimatter to boost the speed of your Rocket, Space Station and Outpost
- Use the new Space Center menu to manage every aspect of your Space Company
- Several tweaks and bugfixes

- Content and new Staff for upcoming event "Solar Colonies" has been added

- New Feature: You can now merge your equipment to improve level and effectiveness.
